dialogues.text: Ash enters a vast digital garden. Flowering trees sway in nonexistent wind. NPCs stand frozen in place—some smiling, some weeping, some stuck in silent screams.

dialogues.speaker: FLUX
dialogues.text: This was a prototype for SHARD's emotional therapy zone. It was supposed to simulate joy and catharsis.

dialogues.speaker: ASH
dialogues.text: (looking around) It feels like walking through someone else’s memories… ones they didn’t want to feel.
